page.title: 03Sport-Budleigh Salterton
page.content:
For a small town Budleigh Salterton has a wide range of sports facilities for adults. {The Golf Club}is situated on the cliffs overlooking the sea.It is open all the year round and visitors can buy tickets for a day or a week.A professional player is available to give lessons. {The Cricket Club}near the mouth of the River Otter is open to the public during the season and in Cricket Week in August. {The Games Club}has grass and hard tennis courts as well as indoor and outdoor bowling rinks. {The Football Club}provides very good sport and has produced players for the Exeter City team.
ITY
